description: This file contains example code demonstrating the usage of various agents, tools, and knowledge bases in a conversational AI framework. It includes definitions of multiple agent instances with different configurations, a knowledge base setup, and a team of agents collaborating on complex tasks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific model, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents collaborating on tasks.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base that loads PDF content from URLs.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Vector database interface for search and embedding.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response of an agent or team, optionally streaming.
